title: Leader of Meitei Leepun, Pramot Singh threatening Civil war in Manipur unless Government intervens
selftext: This is a long video but  please do watch it. There are more interviews with leaders from both communities(Kukis and Meities )on the YouTube channel.. There is no hiding for his hatred. To have the audacity to threaten a wipe out of an entire community on camera is scary. Check out the last 10 min of the  video atleast.
comments:
“How this man is not behind bars?”

Waves saffron muffler.

“Oh! That’s how..”
